name: Endless Runner: Balkan Driver [Android]
description:
Intro:

 Driving a car in an unreal situation by avoiding other cars from the opposite direction.  As long as you stay on the road and do not cause any car collisions you are increasing your points.

 

Plot:

The story begins on the city road in a dynamic driving atmosphere, with music in the background which additionally raises the atmosphere of the game.

 

 Gameplay:

A simple car ride in which the goal is to stay alive and do not hit the other cars.  Please do not blame the author of this project howewer this is still my  first game development project I have made.

 

 Platforms:

This initial project game was created for  Android 4.3 and above.

 

Target audience:

The target audience for this game will be anyone mostly non demanding people who dont look for level details and are not obsessed with advanced game graphics.

 Control Scheme and UI:

 The control scheme will be simple,  two touch buttons will be designated to move car left and right

Score for the time counter are in the top left corner on the screen and the highscore of best time  in seconds are in the top right  corner on the screen.
